tool_description: Compare the similarity of the two faces to verify whether they are the same person or not.
name: Face Comparison
title: Face Comparison

api_list.name: face comparison
api_list.description: Compare the similarity of the two faces to verify whether they are the same person or not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://face-comparison.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/face-compare"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-comparison.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://face-comparison.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/face-compare"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-comparison.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
